fields.label: Header Background Image (optional)
fields.name: header_bg_image
fields.instructions: You can add a background image. Leave it ampty to just use the background color

fields.label: Issue Date Color
fields.name: issue_date_color
fields.instructions: Choose the color of the issue date

sub_fields.label: Featured Image
sub_fields.name: featured_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add here the featured image. The size must be 620px wide X 280px height. Images with different size will be resized to this format.

sub_fields.label: Call To Action Background Color
sub_fields.name: cta_bg_color
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the background color of the call to action box

sub_fields.label: Call To Action Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.default_value: Aenean a purus dolor. Sed maximus, orci vel ullamcorper suscipit, nisl massa posuere nisi, eu bibendum diam turpis posuere ex.

sub_fields.label: Call To Action Button Text Color
sub_fields.name: cta_button_text_color

fields.label: Content Box
fields.name: content_box
fields.instructions: A content box consists of a main photo and four thumbnails, plus a description text and a button. You can add as many content boxes as you want

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.default_value: Beautiful Day in Paradise - In the Morning

sub_fields.label: Main Photo
sub_fields.name: main_photo
sub_fields.instructions: The correct size for this photo is 366px X 209px. Bigger photos will be resized

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail 1
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_1
sub_fields.instructions: Thumbnails are images of size 80px X 50px. All the images will be resized to this format

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail 2
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_2
sub_fields.instructions: Thumbnails are images of size 80px X 50px. All the images will be resized to this format

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail 3
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_3
sub_fields.instructions: Thumbnails are images of size 80px X 50px. All the images will be resized to this format

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail 4
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_4
sub_fields.instructions: Thumbnails are images of size 80px X 50px. All the images will be resized to this format

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: In ultricies bibendum risus sit amet placerat. Vivamus porttitor ornare mattis. Curabitur laoreet nisl felis, non blandit turpis. Quisque vitae metus mi. Integer volutpat, metus quis.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: sidebar_description
sub_fields.default_value: Quisque vitae ligula arcu, in dona eu rutrum magna.

sub_fields.label: Photo
sub_fields.name: extra_photo
sub_fields.instructions: The required size is 157px X 100px Images will be resized to this format

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: extra_content
sub_fields.default_value: Quisque vitae ligula arcu, in dona eu rutrum magna.

sub_fields.label: Banner
sub_fields.name: advertising_banner
sub_fields.instructions: The maximum width of the image is 157px. As long as the image is not larger than 157px it won't be resized. There's no limit on the image height

fields.label: Social Media
fields.name: social_media
fields.instructions: Add your social media profiles here

sub_fields.label: Social Media Logo
sub_fields.name: social_media_logo
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the logo of your social media profile

sub_fields.label: Social Media Name
sub_fields.name: social_media_name
sub_fields.instructions: Add the name of the social media that you are adding (Facebook, Twitter etc.)

sub_fields.label: Social Profile URL
sub_fields.name: social_profile_url
sub_fields.instructions: Add the social profile URL to associate with the above logo

fields.label: Your Company Name
fields.name: your_company_name
fields.instructions: This will be added to the footer to identify you as the sender
